todos.title: First own made texture
todos.description: This is my first scene made with my own textures. Was rendered in Arnold. This textures were made in photoshop and the bumping was made with the help of a online plugin

todos.title: 6M - 3D office Model
todos.description: This is a model made in maya for a company named SteelMax, This model was rendered using Arnold and some free textures.

todos.title: Branding Photoedit
todos.description: This was a photo sesion of a proyect of my school. Here you can see what can you do with a good manage of the photoshop tools.

todos.title: 1st Maya 3d Model - Pirate Ship
todos.description: This is my first 3d Model made in Maya. Made in my 3rd semester of university.
